content: पुष्टिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [पुष् भावे-क्तिन्] {@--1@} Nourisheding, breeding, or rearing. {@--2@} Nourishment, growth, increase, advance; यत्पिंषतामपि नृणां पिष्टोपि तनोषि परिमलैः पुष्टिं <ls>Bv. 1. 12.</ls> {@--3@} Strength, fatness, fulness, plumpness; अंधस्य दृष्टिरिव पुष्टिरिवातुरस्य <ls>Mk. 1. 49.</ls> {@--4@} Prosperity, thriving. {@--5@} Maintenance, support. {@--6@} Wealth, property, means of comfort; <ls>R. 18. 32.</ls> {@--7@} Richness, magnificence. {@--8@} Development, perfection.
